Uses of Class
graphicmotor.entities.Entity

  • Packages that use Entity 
    Package Description
    graphicmotor.entities  

    • Uses of Entity in graphicmotor.entities

      Subclasses of Entity in graphicmotor.entities 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimatedEntity
      An AnimatedEntity work with an Animation as the current Animation and the index of the current sprite.
      class  MultipledAnimatedEntity<KEY>
      A multipledAnimatedEntity is simply working with an AnimationBank It provide a method to set the current animation of the animated entity
      class  SimpleRect
      SimpleRect use basic GL methods to draw a rectangle using protected data in superclass Entity
      class  SingleAnimatedEntity
      SingleAnimatedEntity is the basic extension of an AnimatedEntity It just set the current animation at the construction and launch it at the initialization.
      class  StaticEntity
      A static entity render the resource specified at the constructor
      class  TextEntity
      TextEntity is a class able to render text on the context
      class  TexturedEntity
      A texturedEntity is always construct from an existing PNG resource.
      Methods in graphicmotor.entities that return Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Entity EntitiesBank.get(int entityId)
      Entity's assessor
      Methods in graphicmotor.entities that return types with arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<Entity> EntitiesBank.iterator() 
      Methods in graphicmotor.entities with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int EntitiesBank.addEntities(Entity entity)
      Add the entity to the context's bank.
